Summary: Apparently diamond shaped and with occasionally flashing red, slow moving
divs: Sighting DetailsFirst filming I was watching TV and opened my front door facing the ocean and I noticed a light and starting filming it. I noticed a light over the Pacific ocean looking west to northwest and it looked like a airplane or a star but wasnt moving fast and didnt have flashing beacons. The next day I shared the footage with my friend Chris and he was amazed and I suggested that we look and see if it was there again and to our amazement the light did reappear.I filmed it 2 days April 27 and April 28, the first day was at 9:51pm and the next day around the same time but an hour later. I couldn't decipher the distance because of the darkness at night. The object was moving very slowly and progressively moved west to northwest and in the distance I noticed it move extremely fast. At times fading out and reappearing. My feelings are Iam not sure what the object was or is and wanted document it. I lost sight of the object because it went of sight and completely disappeared.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around April 28th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
